resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this photo?
The Gallery app is not installed or is disabled.
Select the weather for the diary creation time. Weather selection is not mandatory.
Type the title of the diary. Entering a subject is not mandatory.
Enter diaries, notes, summary notes, and more.
Attach a photo to the diary.
Enlarge the text used in the diary.
Reduce the font used in the diary.
Select the diary creation date. If you want to create a diary for the past date, you can change the date.
Select diary creation time. You can change the time if you want to create a diary for the last time.
The speech recognition module is not installed or is disabled.
I repeat what I know when I speak.
The more bad news we hear, the more we should be happy.
Abundance calls comfort, constraint calls creativity.

When you look back at your past life, you will surely know that you have been damaging your life because you are too careful not to be in danger.
Danger of danger.
Danger rather than being careful.
- Grant money, In the law of
When you talk, you are only repeating what you already know.\nBut if you listen, you may learn something new.\n-The Dalai Lama

It is the bad news that you need to hear most as a leader. 
The good news is good tomorrow, but the bad news will be worse tomorrow. 
This is because even if the facts are heartbreaking, That's why it's safe to say. 
- Eric Schmidt, President of Google, "How does Google work?"

Constraints are not a barrier to creativity, but creativity is used to overcome constraints. \nAll great works or creative solutions are those that have a lot of time constraints, physical constraints, and resource constraints. Creativity is born in a constrained environment. \n- Representative Kim Bong-Jin
You can create various diaries such as diary, memo, summary note, etc. according to the flow of time.
You can search for diaries using keywords. When a keyword is entered, the matching diary is searched and the keyword is highlighted.
You can use the speech recognition feature to enter search keywords without a keypad.
The created diary can be collected by date using the calendar.
The created diary is provided as a timeline.
You can view charts of diary entries for the entire period.
You can use advanced settings to change fonts, set lock number, backup and restore diary.
Click the diary card in the list to view the diary.
The image attachment method of the EasyDiary is changed so that the existing link information is compressed and stored in the EasyDiary folder.\nPlease wait for the operation to finish.
Are you sure you want to delete?
Browse the saved diary. You can modify a saved diary or create a diary card by specifying a custom color.
Drag the screen left or right to view diaries created before or after.
You can go to the diary editing screen to edit the diary being viewed.
You can listen to the diary text by voice using the Google TTS feature.
Use the diary to create post cards and share them with others.
You can delete the current diary and go to the search screen.
Click the \'OK\' button to go to the previous screen without saving the current diary.
Insufficient permission for the request feature.
Recover all content except attachments using data backed up to Google Drive.
Users directly recover photos attached to the diary.
Back up all content except attachments to Google Drive.

Add your own TTF fonts to the Easy Diary.\nIf the fonts are added, you can use the added fonts with the built-in fonts.\nWhen you select a TTF file using the file explorer, the font is automatically registered in Easy Diary and activated in the font setting menu.
When the option is activated, it checks whether the diary matches case.
Set the primary color of the application.
The current version only supports theme color changes.\nText color changes will be available in the future.
The current version only supports theme color changes.\nBackground color changes will be available in the future.
Easy Photo Map is a photomap application that displays the location of the photo on the map using the location information included in the photo.
Easy Password is an application that helps you manage passwords used for login, document security, door lock, lock, credit card, account management, etc. by using one pattern lock set by the user.
Change the line spacing of the font to the set ratio.
There is no diary created on that day.
No photos found.\nAttached photos from Gallery may have been deleted or moved.
An error occurred while generating the diary card. Please try again.
You can use the saved diary to create and save custom postcards.
Change the postcard text color. You can select the desired color using the color picker.
Change the postcard background color. You can select the desired color using the color picker.
Postcard created can be saved as image files.
Postcard created can be shared with friends. Share your postcard with email, mms, messenger, and more.
Exit the postcard editing screen and return to the previous screen.
Share the %s application with your friends.
v1.4.41 / 2018.05.28\n Fixed a bug that abnormally terminated in Postcard browse mode when there is no working directory
v1.4.47 / 2018.08.29\n Added post card deletion function
v1.4.51 / 2018.09.29\n AAF common module update\n Change app packaging environment to Android 9 Pie
v1.4.53 / 2018.10.13\n Added preview photo size setting function\n Added preview photo toggle function(fold or unfold)
v1.4.55 / 2018.11.01\n Improving the time expression of diary writing\n Boldface setting function added to diary title and timeline time information
v1.4.57 / 2018.11.12\n Added multi-picker setting function to attach multiple pictures at one time
v1.4.63 / 2018.11.25\n Added attached photos backup and recovery function using Google Drive
v1.4.65 / 2018.12.19\n Added lock function using fingerprint sensor
v1.4.67 / 2019.01.01\n Improved the ability to view attached photos on the postcard screen

v1.4.68 / 2019.01.06\n Solved security considerations for some items that are reported with low confidence in Sophos vaccine(Notification listener, Trigger installation)\n Add Postcard font size adjustment function

v1.4.69 / 2019.01.16
 User Experience (UX) Optimization
 Fixed an error that screen transition is not normal in Android 9 Pie version
 Add timeline diary creation button
v1.4.70 / 2019.01.25\n Added option to view summary of diary content
v1.4.71 / 2019.01.26\n Fixed an error that the application terminated abnormally when changing device fingerprint information
v1.4.73 / 2019.02.11\n Improved the ability to correct input digits when PIN is set and unlocked
v1.4.74 / 2019.03.06\n Improved the ability to apply filters to postcard images\n Added ability to export diary to Excel file
v1.4.75 / 2019.03.22\n Add application-specific information pages, including FAQs and privacy policies\n Improved pin and fingerprint unlock toggle
v1.4.76 / 2019.04.24\n Add 50 kinds of diary symbol icons
v1.4.77 / 2019.05.11\n Add diary symbols and apply categories
v1.4.78 / 2019.05.13\n Fixed an error that ended abnormally if some function of the setting screen does not have access to device storage
v1.4.80 / 2019.06.07\n Changed Google Drive Android API to Google Drive REST API (Google Drive Android API will be shut down on December 6, 2019)
v1.4.83 / 2019.06.09\n Apply Android App Bundle to reduce and optimize installation file size
v1.4.85 / 2019.06.18\n Google Drive(REST API) user rights acquisition error correction
v1.4.86 / 2019.06.19\n Google Drive(REST API) Recovering photos with diary Fixing errors
v1.4.87 / 2019.06.20\n Fixed authentication token error for users authenticated to use Google Drive in v1.4.80 earlier
v1.4.88 / 2019.07.16\n Migrated Android support library to AndroidX version\n Add diary symbol icon
v1.4.91 / 2019.08.12\n Added backup and recovery function using device storage\n Fixed an issue that caused some text to be truncated on calendars on some devices
v1.4.93 / 2019.08.29\n User Experience (UX) Optimization\n Bug fixes that crash abnormally when entering the configuration screen on older OS
v1.4.94 / 2019.09.03\n Added calendar weekday start setting\n Fixed an issue that prevented the calendar from showing in tablet landscape
v1.4.97 / 2019.09.17\n Improved timeline search filter\n Diary copy function added
v1.4.99 / 2019.09.26\n Diary text counting function added
v1.4.101 / 2019.10.03\n Respond to Android 10 storage access issues (targetSdkVersion temporary downgrade to avoid scoped storage policy)
v1.4.103 / 2019.10.09\n Change storage location and migrate to respond to Android 10 Scoped Storage policies
v1.4.104 / 2019.10.19\n Added calendar font scale setting\n Apply sliding page to setting screen
v1.4.105 / 2019.10.20\n Fixed an error that occurred when using the Excel file device saving function\n Fixed error when deleting diary from timeline
v1.4.106 / 2019.10.25\n Fixed the error that the changed contents are not immediately visible after editing the diary\n Remediation for Vulnerable Libraries with known Security Issues
v1.4.108 / 2019.11.18\n Fixed an error that occurred when setting the calendar font scale on a device set to French
v1.4.110 / 2019.12.13\n Added Diary Dashboard feature\n Added the ability to delete the diary backup file stored in the device
v1.4.112 / 2019.12.31\n Add photo attachment function through camera app integration\n Diary Dashboard Improvements
v1.4.113 / 2020.01.04\n Added date movement function using date picker on calendar screen
v1.4.114 / 2020.01.15\n Added diary symbol icon\n Added French support
v1.4.116 / 2020.01.21\n License policy changed from 「Apache License 2.0」 to 「GNU General Public License v3.0」
v1.4.118 / 2020.02.11\n [BETA] Added full data backup feature
v1.4.120 / 2020.02.19\n Added diary symbol icon\n Added search function using diary symbol
v1.4.121 / 2020.03.02\n Improved the speed of the calendar screen(1st improvement)

v1.4.122 / 2020.03.09
 [BETA] Added full data recovery feature
 Some symbols appear unusually large in dashboard statistics
 Added sort option of the diary list in the calendar screen
v1.4.124 / 2020.03.15\n Separate font-related setting option from basic setting screen

v1.4.125 / 2020.03.23
 Added cursor position setting option when entering diary edit screen
 Added the function to set the maximum number of lines in the content summary view option
 Fixed an issue where the day of the week was cut off on the calendar screen
v1.4.126 / 2020.04.05\n Added diary encryption feature using pin number\n Temporarily apply the requestLegacyExternalStorage option to respond to multi-picker scoped storage issues in Android 10
v1.4.127 / 2020.04.12\n Removed requestLegacyExternalStorage option\n Adding database file backup and recovery feature using SAF (Storage Access Framework)
v1.4.129 / 2020.04.21\n Added feature to attach animated GIF files\n Added diary multiple copy and delete feature
v1.4.130 / 2020.05.20\n Added diary schedule setting feature
v1.4.131 / 2020.05.26\n Fixed an error that caused abnormal termination of some screens in Android 4.4 version
v1.4.132 / 2020.05.31\n Fixed an issue where buttons included inside the card view could not be identified when the theme color and the card view background color were set to the same color
v1.4.133 / 2020.06.02\n Fixed an issue where the lock screen icon was not identified when the screen background color was set to white
v1.4.136 / 2020.06.29\n Added diary list widget feature
v1.4.137 / 2020.07.05\n Applied Google Play security policy
v1.4.139 / 2020.07.11\n Added feature to display the information of the connected Google account\n Added Google Drive backup feature using scheduler
v1.4.140 / 2020.07.20\n Fixed an error that the scheduler did not work in the application termination state
v1.4.141 / 2020.08.03\n User Experience (UX) Optimization\n French translation updates
v1.4.143 / 2020.08.26\n Fixed an issue where some devices were abnormally terminated in the setting screen
v1.4.146 / 2020.09.10\n German translation updates\n Added location information display option
v1.4.148 / 2020.09.15\n Added task symbol sorting option
v1.4.150 / 2020.09.22\n Fixed a bug where the widget was not displayed normally
v1.4.151 / 2020.10.05\n Diary creation button added to the calendar screen
v1.4.152 / 2020.10.19\n Russian translation updates\n User Experience (UX) Optimization
v1.4.153 / 2020.11.10\n Hindi translation added\n User Experience (UX) Optimization
Sets the thumbnail size of the photo attached to the diary. The set size only applies to the diary creation and modification screen, not to the search screen.
Check for new features by release version.
Set the diary title and timeline time to be displayed in bold.
When attaching a diary photo, I use the multi-picker provided in the diary without using the gallery app. When Multi-picker is enabled, you can attach multiple pictures at once.
Backup your attached photos to Google Drive. This feature may not work on some devices due to beta service.
Recover attached photos backed up to Google Drive. This feature may not work on some devices due to beta service.
All backup target files already exist.
The file to be backed up does not exist.
All recovery target files already exist.
The file to be recovered does not exist.
If the device supports fingerprint recognition and has a registered fingerprint, lock the application with the registered fingerprint.
The operating system installed on the device does not support fingerprint recognition.
To use fingerprint lock, you need to set PIN first.
Fingerprint authentication failed. please try again.
The fingerprint authentication information of the device has changed and the previously set authentication information can not be used.
Set the PIN to lock the application.
To disable PIN lock, you need to turn off fingerprint lock.
Please enter a number to use as a PIN.
Optimize the card view design for device.
Summarize the contents of the diary provided in the calendar, timeline, search screen, and so on.
The fingerprint information of the device has been changed. Change the PIN lock mode to unlock, then unlock the fingerprint lock and set it again.
Save all content except the attached photo as an Excel file.
You can check frequently asked questions and answers.
Choose a symbol that matches the current weather or diary content.
Please choose a recovery target file.
Do you want to start an attached photo backup task?
Do you want to start an attached photo recovery task?

Back up database files except the attached photo to the device storage.\nSince files backed up in the internal storage are deleted when the application is deleted, use the external public storage or Google Drive backup function to permanently store the created data.
The database file has been saved to the device storage at the path below.
Recovers database files from device storage except attachments.
Set the start day of the week.
Do you want to copy the selected diary?
Count the number of characters in the diary body.
Excel file creation and email sending
All content except the attached photo is created as an Excel file and attached to the email.
Storage location changes will be made in accordance with the Android 10 Scoped Storage policy. This job runs only once.
Remove token information published by Easy Diary using Google Drive linked account.
Scales the font size inside the calendar based on the set global font size.
There is not enough data to generate ranking data. You need to write a diary using at least 4 symbols to activate dash board ranking.
Delete the backup file stored in the storage.

Compress and back up all the data related to the diary such as database, attached photo, post card, font, etc. into one file.\nThis feature is a beta feature therefore may not work properly on some devices.
Select the diary symbol you want to filter.
Decompress and recover all the data related to the diary such as database, attached photo, post card, font, etc.\nThis feature is a beta feature therefore may not work properly on some devices.
Set the sort order of the daily diary list in the calendar screen.
When the edit screen starts, the scroll position on the browse screen is maintained. If this setting is not set, scrolling moves to the last position of the text.
Set the maximum number of lines to be displayed when the content summary option is activated.

Please enter the pin number to be used for diary encryption.\nEncrypt the title and body of the currently selected diary using the entered pin number.\nThe pin number cannot be recovered, so be careful not to forget the set pin number.
Enter the pin number to be used for diary decoding.\nDecrypt the diary\'s title and body content using the entered pin number.
Enter the pin number to be used for diary encryption once more.
The first entered PIN number does not match the confirmation PIN number.\nPlease enter the PIN number again.
The PIN numbers do not match.\nPlease enter the PIN number you set when encrypting the diary.
Enter the PIN number you set when encrypting the diary.\nWhen the diary is edited, it is encrypted again with the existing password.
Remove the pin number setting after decryption
The backup file is saved in the Easy Diary internal storage. The backed up files cannot be accessed using applications other than Easy Diary.
The backup file is stored in an external public storage. The backed up files can be accessed using File Explorer.
Diary contents are restored using the database backup file stored in the Easy Diary internal storage.
Diary contents are restored using the database backup file stored in the external public storage.
Are you sure you want to delete the %d selected items?
Are you sure you want to duplicate the %d selected items?
Diary writing\nRegister the diary writing schedule.\nWhen the schedule is registered, a notification message is provided according to the set day and time.

Diary backup (Device storage)\nRegistering the schedule backs up the database files excluding attached photos to the device local storage according to the set day and time and provides the result of the operation as a notification message.
There is no set schedule information.\nClick the plus button on the top right to add a new schedule.
Authorization is required to use Easy Diary.

Diary backup (Google Drive)\nRegistering the schedule backs up the database files and attached photos to the Google Drive according to the set day and time and provides the result of the operation as a notification message.
Connect your account to Google Drive for easy diary data backup.
The device entered doze mode and the backup operation using the network failed. If you touch the notification window, the backup operation will resume.
Touch the notification window to go to the diary screen.
Diary backup completed on local device.
The diary backup file and attached photo were saved in Google Drive.%s
The location information is displayed in the diary using GPS information.
Align the task symbol to the top
If the type of Task Symbol is TODO or DOING among the diaries to which the task symbol is applied, it is arranged at the top of the list.
